jsymbolic2.processing

Class AceConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsymbolic2.processing.AceConversion

  • public final class AceConversion
extends java.lang.Object
    General conversion class from ACE XML to ARFF or CSV that should only be called statically. This class will convert ACE XML to ARFF and then use the ARFF file to obtain the CSV file. Therefore the ACE XML file is always built and if the CSV file is required, the ARFF file is also built as an intermediate.

        public static void convertACEtoCSVwithARFF(java.lang.String ace_xml_input_file_path,
                                           java.lang.String csv_output_file_path)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Builds an CSV file using an ARFF file intermediate but then removes the ARFF file for convenience.
        Parameters:
        ace_xml_input_file_path - input ace file path
        csv_output_file_path - output csv file path
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the input file could not be successfully parsed and converted.

      • convertACEXMLtoARFF

        public static void convertACEXMLtoARFF(java.lang.String ace_xml_input_file_path,
                                       java.lang.String weka_arff_output_file_path)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parse the specified ace_xml_input_file_path ACE XML Feature Value file and convert it into a new Weka ARFF file at the path specified by weka_arff_output_file_path. Note that any existing file at the output path is overwritten.

        The instance identifiers stored in the ACE XML file are printed to standard out, as these cannot be stored in a meaningful way in Weka ARFF files. Also, the Weka relation name is defaulted to "Converted_from_ACE_XML".

        Parameters:
        ace_xml_input_file_path - The path of the input ACE XML file containing feature values that is to be parsed and converted.
        weka_arff_output_file_path - The path of the new Weka ARFF file to save to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the input file could not be successfully parsed and converted.

      • convertARFFtoCSV

        public static void convertARFFtoCSV(java.lang.String weka_arff_input_file_path,
                                    java.lang.String csv_output_file_path)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Convert ARFF file directly to CSV file.
        Parameters:
        weka_arff_input_file_path - input arff file path
        csv_output_file_path - output csv file path
        Throws:

      • outputArffandCsvFormats

        public static AceConversionPaths outputArffandCsvFormats(java.lang.String ace_xml_input_file,
                                                         boolean ARFFcheck,
                                                         boolean CSVcheck)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Output file formats depending on -csv and -arff switches given.
        Parameters:
        ace_xml_input_file - input ace xml file path
        ARFFcheck - true if we need to output arff
        CSVcheck - true if we need to output csv
        Returns:
        A conversion paths object that contains all paths to appropriate jSymbolic conversions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the input file could not be successfully parsed and converted.
